adequate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose
adequate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
The standard of his work is barely adequate.
The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
Are the parking facilities adequate for 50 cars?
The lunchtime menu is more than adequate to satisfy the biggest appetite.
adequate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Her performance was adequate but lacked originality.
